UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Improved policy relevant data, analysis and evidence base on situation of women and children particularly those belonging to the vulnerable and marginalized groups to support evidence based advocacy, follow-up support and development of a child-and-gender sensitive social protection programme
